The letter was not posted on Rush Limbau: s official social media accounts or website, indicating that it did not originate from him.
The letter was circulating online before: s name was attached to it, with the earliest known version posted on Facebook in late November 2020.
The letter referred to the 2020 election: suggesting that it was written before the election took place.
